alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 09 at 1:31AM PDT until October 09 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...State Highway 31 from the community of Summer Lake to north of Paisley and the Winter Rim in eastern Lake County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
